Layers of Fear: Inheritance expands the plot from Layers of Fear and tells the story of the painterâ€™s daughter, who comes back to her childhood home to face her past. Can she forgive her father, or will she resent all that has happened? Relive her experiences and witness the full scope of the tragedy that has swallowed up the family. Face the memories of her past and shape them into the destiny that awaits her.
